name: Whatfix
description: Whatfix is a data-driven digital adoption platform (DAP) that enables organizations and users to maximize the benefits of software. Whatfix acts as an interactive overlay on top of any application to guide users with real-time guidance, self-help support, and user feedback. With product analytics and AI, Whatfix enables scalable success with technology, maximizing productivity, and leveraging data-driven insights for better decision-making. At Whatfix, we’re on a mission to empower users to unlock the true potential of software applications. We make this possible through the vision of userization. Whatfix has seven global offices in the US, India, UK, Germany, Singapore and Australia, and works with Fortune 500 companies around the world.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Software Clicks faster,smarter,smoother with Whatfix
ShortDescription: Whatfix is a data-driven digital adoption platform (DAP) that enables users to maximize the benefits of software.

Highlights.name: Delight new users with a seamless employee onboarding experience
Highlights.description: Create personalized and engaging employee onboarding programs at scale and catapult your employees to rapid productivity

Highlights.name: Reach your potential with new technology
Highlights.description: Whatfix simplifies enterprise software adoption, improving the ROI of your technology stack

Highlights.name: Next-Gen Performance Support Platform
Highlights.description: Whatfix’s in-app performance support helps empower employees to perform tasks effectively using just-in-time and interactive help

enhanced_description: Whatfix is a data-driven digital adoption platform (DAP) that enables organizations and their users to maximize the benefits of any software application. It functions as an interactive overlay, providing real-time guidance, self-help support, and user feedback directly within the application interface. By leveraging product analytics and AI, Whatfix drives scalable success with technology, enhances productivity, and provides data-driven insights for improved decision-making. For HR, Whatfix specializes in delivering seamless and personalized employee onboarding experiences, accelerating new hires to rapid productivity. It also serves as a next-gen performance support platform, empowering employees with just-in-time and interactive in-app assistance to perform tasks effectively. Whatfix's mission is to empower users to unlock the true potential of software applications through its vision of 'userization', serving a global clientele including Fortune 500 companies.
key_use_cases: Driving digital adoption for enterprise software applications
Delivering seamless and personalized employee onboarding experiences
Providing in-app, just-in-time performance support for users
Improving the return on investment (ROI) of technology stacks
Guiding users with context-aware, real-time interactive help within applications
Enabling self-help support for users to troubleshoot and learn independently
Collecting and analyzing user feedback for software improvement
Utilizing product analytics to derive insights for better business decisions
Optimizing recruiting processes by supporting the adoption of recruiting software
